subject: Baseball
Spanish Language
Translation and Interpreters
Hispanic-Americans
lead_paragraph: According to a new initiative pushed by the Yankees’ Carlos Beltran, each of the league’s 30 teams will provide a full-time interpreter for Spanish-speaking players.
snippet: According to a new initiative pushed by the Yankees’ Carlos Beltran, each of the league’s 30 teams will provide a full-time interpreter for Spanish-speaking players.
